name: Compressed VRML World File
summary: Learn about .WRZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Since WRZ files use Gzip compression, they can be opened with any Gzip decompression utility, such as 7-Zip, Corel WinZip, or Smith Micro StuffIt.

description: 3D image file written in the VRML (Virtual Reality Modeling Language) language; describes a world that can be navigated in three dimensions; saved using Gzip (.GZ) compression, and is the compressed version of a plain text .WRL file.
